title: GeologicUnitView
description: <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnitView</font> is a simplified view of a GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font> feature with key property values from an associated <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>.   The <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnitView</font> property values are summarised as labels (unconstrained character strings) or arbitrarily selected classifiers to be used for thematic mapping purposes. The latter are the properties suffixed with “_uri” and will contain URIs referring to controlled concepts in published vocabularies.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description:
Globally unique <font color="#4f81bd">identifier:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall uniquely identifies a tuple within the dataset. Identifiers shall be formatted as URI according to RFC 3986.  This URI could be used to access more detailed, such as a GeoSciML Basic, representation of the feature

The identifier should have the same value as the corresponding GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font> identifier, if available.

name.title: name
name.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">name:Primitive::CharacterString</font> is a display name for the GeologicUnit.

description.title: description
description.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">description:Primitive::CharacterString</font> is a description of the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>, typically taken from an entry on a geological map legend.

geologicUnitType.title: geologicUnitType
geologicUnitType.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">geologicUnitType</font> (<font color="#4f81bd">Primitive::CharacterString</font>) contains the type of <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> (as defined in GeoSciML). To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">geologicUnitType_uri </font>shall be used.

rank.title: rank
rank.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">rank:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contain the rank of <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> (as defined by ISC. e.g., group, formation, member).

lithology.title: lithology
lithology.description: If present, <font color="#4f81bd">lithology</font> contains a human readable description as <font color="#4f81bd">Primitive::CharacterString</font> of the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>’s lithology, possibly formatted with formal syntax.  The description can be language-dependent.  To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">representativeLithology_uri</font> shall be used.

geologicHistory.title: geologicHistory
geologicHistory.description: If present, contains a human readable description in <font color="#4f81bd">Primitive::CharacterString</font>, possibly formatted with formal syntax, of the age of the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> (where age is a sequence of events and may include process and environment information). To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">representativeAge_uri</font>, <font color="#4f81bd">representativeOlderAge_uri</font>, <font color="#4f81bd">representativeYoungerAge_uri</font> shall be used.

numericOlderAge.title: numericOlderAge
numericOlderAge.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">numericOlderAge</font> age is a numerical representation (<font color="#4f81bd">Primitive::Number</font>) of the unit’s older age in million years (Ma).

numericYoungerAge.title: numericYoungerAge
numericYoungerAge.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">numericYoungerAge</font> is a numerical representation (<font color="#4f81bd">Primitive::Number</font>) of the unit’s younger age in million years (Ma).

observationMethod.title: observationMethod
observationMethod.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">observationMethod:Primitive::CharacterString</font> is a metadata snippet indicating how the spatial extent of the feature was determined. <font color="#4f81bd">ObservationMethod</font> is a convenience property that provides a simple approach to observation metadata when data are reported using a feature view (as opposed to observation view).

positionalAccuracy.title: positionalAccuracy
positionalAccuracy.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">positionalAccuracy:Primitive::CharacterString</font> is a quantitative value (a numerical value and a unit of length) defining the radius of an uncertainty buffer around a <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font> (e.g., a <font color="#4f81bd">positionalAccuracy</font> of 100 m for a line feature defines a buffer polygon of total width 200 m centred on the line).

source.title: source
source.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">source:Primitive::CharacterString</font> is human readable text describing feature-specific details and citations to source materials, and if available provides URLs to reference material and publications describing the geologic feature. This could be a short text synopsis of key information that would also be in the metadata record referenced by metadata_uri.

geologicUnitType_uri.title: geologicUnitType_uri
geologicUnitType_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">geologicUnitType_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept from a vocabulary defining the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> types.

representativeLithology_uri.title: representativeLithology_uri
representativeLithology_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeLithology_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall contain a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the characteristic or representative lithology of the unit. This may be a concept that defines the super-type of all lithology values present within a <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> or a concept defining the lithology of the dominant <font color="#4f81bd">CompositionPart</font> (as defined in GeoSciML) of the unit.

representativeAge_uri.title: representativeAge_uri
representativeAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeAge_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall  contain a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative stratigraphic age interval for the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising the all or part of the feature's history.

representativeOlderAge_uri.title: representativeOlderAge_uri
representativeOlderAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeOlderAge_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall contain a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative older value in a range of stratigraphic age intervals for the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising the all or part of the feature's history.

representativeYoungerAge_uri.title: representativeYoungerAge_uri
representativeYoungerAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeYoungerAge_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall contain a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative younger value in a range of stratigraphic age intervals for the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising the all or part of the feature's history.

specification_uri.title: specification_uri
specification_uri.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">specification_uri:Primitive::CharacterString </font>shall contain a URI referring the GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicUnit</font> feature that describes the instance in detail.

metadata_uri.title: metadata_uri
metadata_uri.description: If present, the <font color="#4f81bd">property metadata_uri:Primitive::CharacterString </font>contains a URI referring to a metadata record describing the provenance of data.

genericSymbolizer.title: genericSymbolizer
genericSymbolizer.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">genericSymbolizer:CharacterString</font> contains an identifier for a symbol from standard (locally or community defined) symbolization scheme for portrayal.

any-1.title: any
any-1.description: A data provider may add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.

any-2.title: any
any-2.description: A data provider may add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.

any-3.title: any
any-3.description: A data provider may add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.
